altTitles.ja: エスポワール前カイジ

description.en: The night before Kaiji's life spirals out of control, he finds a new friend in Bongo, the Kenyan exchange student with amazing eyesight!

altTitles.ja: キャプテン翼ライジングサン   F I N A L S

description.en:
A web-comic continuation of Captain Tsubasa 9th arc: Rising Sun - The Final.

Rising Sun - FINALS is covering the 2nd half of the Madrid Olympics match of Japan VS. Spain and beyond.

The web-comic came to be when on April 2024 mangaka Yoichi Takahashi announced his retirement, ending Rising Sun - The Final official published serialization half-way through the match opting to continue the story at his own pace with storyboard pencil sketches, publishing them on the official Captain Tsubasa World website.

title.en: My Clumsy and Erotic Neighbor Sayuri-san

altTitles.ja: 不器用でエロい隣人さゆりさん

altTitles.es-la: Mi torpe y erótica vecina Sayuri-san

description.en: Series Follows Our Main Character and His Interactions With His Neighbor Sayuri-san.
description.ja: 高校生の主人公が、隣人の主婦である「さゆりさん」と様々なエロティックなシチュエーションを繰り広げるというストーリー。

altTitles.ja: 天才魔女の魔力枯れ

altTitles.pt-br: A Bruxa gênia perdeu seu MP

altTitles.vi: Nàng Phù Thủy Thiên Tài Hết Mana Rồi!

description.en: Nayu, the one in a million genius witch who has been the talk of the town, has run out of magic! The price for all the things she has been allowed to do because of her brilliance is coming back to the former genius witch like a boomerang... Then, she meets her past student "Komugi" who loves her very much. This is a boomerang love comedy of karmic retribution by a former genius witch who can't be left alone even though it stings a little, abandoned by her magical powers!
description.pt-br: Nayu, aquela em um milhão de bruxas geniais que tem sido o assunto da cidade, ficou sem magia! O preço por todas as coisas que ela foi autorizada a fazer por causa de seu brilhantismo está voltando para a ex-bruxa genial como um bumerangue... Então, ela lembrou de seu ex-aluno "Komugi", que a ama muito. Esta é uma comédia de amor de retribuição cármica por uma ex-bruxa genial que não pode ser deixada sozinha, mesmo que doa um pouco, abandonada por seus poderes mágicos!

title.en: Saikyou Skill "Inochigoi" de Kuyashii Kedo Musou Shichau Moto Maou-sama no Sekai Seifuku Katsudou

altTitles.ja: 最強スキル「命乞い」で悔しいけど無双しちゃう元魔王様の世界征服活動

altTitles.ja-ro: Saikyou Skill "Inochigoi" de Kuyashii Kedo Musou Shichau Moto Maou-sama no Sekai Seifuku Katsudou

altTitles.en: Her Strongest Ability Is Begging for Mercy, the Frustrating World Conquest Adventures of a Former Demon King

altTitles.vi: Hành Trình Chinh Phục Thế Giới Đầy Nhục Nhã của Cựu Ma Vương Với Kỹ Năng Thượng Thừa "Cầu Xin Tha Mạng"

description.en:
Village girl Chelsea, who is beloved by everyone, is actually the reincarnated ex-Demon King.
However, when she reincarnated, for some reason neither her magical powers nor skills were inherited, and she was forced to live as a normal human being.

Humiliating days continued until one day, the remnants of the Demon King's army appeared to loot the village. Hunted down by her former subordinate, who did not realize her true identity, Chelsea finds herself in a perilous situation. Then, a skill finally manifests! The name of that skill is "Begging for Mercy"!?
description.ja: 誰からも愛される村娘のチェルシーは、実は転生した元魔王。 しかし、転生の際になぜか魔力もスキルも引き継げず、ただの人間としての生活を強いられることに…。 そんな屈辱の日々が続くある日、村に魔王軍の残党が略奪に現れる。 自分の正体に気づかない元部下に追い詰められ、絶体絶命のピンチに陥るチェルシーだが、ついにそこでスキルが発現！ そのスキルの名は――「命乞い」!?

altTitles.ja: 重甲ビーファイター
ビーファイターカブト

description.en: Based on the TV Series of the same name, insects all over the world begin to swarm for unknown reasons, with other animals and plants acting strange as well. To investigate this, Takuya Kai is dispatched with an Earth Academia group. Investigating independently, Takuya finds Guru who reveals that insects are preparing for battle against invaders from another dimension. Offering their aid, the Earth Academia create suits of armor to combat the threat as the Jamahl arrive to Earth to enslave humans. Though they have trouble perfecting the Bio-Machinery, Guru arrives to infuse the armor with the life force of many insects. Once the suits become the B-Commanders, one suit chooses Takuya while the other two bond to Daisaku Katagiri and Rei Hayama. With their newfound power, the B-Fighters fight to drive back Jamahl's forces.

title.en: The Story of Ai and Makoto: Love and Sincerity

altTitles.ja: 愛と誠
爱与诚

description.en:
Ai Saotome is a high school girl from a well-to-do family. When she was kid, she was in an accident that resulted in a young boy being permanently scarred between his eyes while she emerged unscathed. Although she never knew who he was, she never forgot him.

Makoto Taiga ' a young man with a scar between his eyes, has had a rough life, but has emerged as a bancho, rough and tough bully - a thug and a brawler and about as rude as they come - all of which he blames on the incident that gave him his scar. When Ai and Makoto run into each other again, Ai feels guilt for what Makoto has become and decides to intervene and rehabilitate him. Is he a diamond in the rough, or just a bully?

NOTE: Volume count based on the bunkoban.

altTitles.ja: ロスト・ワールド (私家版)

description.en:
One night, Ryosuke Jagata is murdered by a thief after a hidden jewel on his person. His butler and rabbit boy Mimio (Mimi-chan) take quick notice. They soon butt heads with Mustachio, a private detective, who decides to take up the case. Mustachio, wanting more information, comes to the laboratory of Prof. Hoyoku Shikishima, a scientist experimenting with giving animals human souls.

Meanwhile, the planet Mamango makes the rounds. Said to be a part of the Earth from long ago, it is now steadily coming closer toward the Earth... Shikishima is researching this planet, and what Jagata was murdered over may be connected to this.

The original version of Lost World done in Tezuka's middle school days. Very close to the final version, but has a great number of differences.

---
**Volumes 360 and 361 of the Osamu Tezuka Complete Works**

title.en: I'll be cursed if I react

altTitles.ja: 反応したら呪われる
薪窯のパンドラ

description.en: Eri Hourai, a second-year high school girl, takes over "Pandora" - a bakery specialising in wood fire cooked goods.
description.zh: 追随前人，过往足迹，今日的少女，也在进行烘焙

description.en: Lin Tian, a genius game designer, was ordered to be executed because he knew too much of the company secrets. At a critical moment, he was betrayed by his lover Luo Yue and was killed in the jungle. When he woke up, he found he became a low-level monster in the jungle. In order to avenge the past, the male protagonist started on his path as a Monster in The Jungle.

**Description translated from the author:**
University graduate Mu Siyun sent his resume to the star fleet on a whim and somehow became the Fleet Admiral! This is the story about an admiral with a harem of 3000 female soldiers conquering the universe.

---

**Translator's version:**
The smartest university student to ever graduate from Daxia University's Department of Political History, Mu Siyun, enlists in Beiyang's Fleet on a whim and somehow becomes the Fleet Admiral. Knowing fully well how the world works and how the rich dominate the poor, Mu Siyun seeks to defy the heavens and bring order and hope back to the universe by cleverly scheming against his enemies.
description.ru: По прихоти судьбы выпускник университета Му Сыюнь отправил свое резюме в звёздный флот и каким-то образом стал адмиралом флота! Это история об адмирале с гаремом в 3000 женщин-солдат, покоряющих вселенную…
description.tr: Üniversiteden mezun olan Mu Siyun, bir heves ile öz geçmişini yıldız filosuna yollar ve her nasılsa filo amirali olur! bu hikaye 3000 kız askerin bir filo amiraliyle evreni ele geçirmesini anlatıyor…

title.en: Mobile Suit Gundam: Red Giant 03rd MS Team

altTitles.ja: 機動戦士ガンダム 赤い三巨星

description.en:
A “red” comet, a black “three” binary star, and a blue “giant star” -- we are the “red three giant stars”!
Universal Century 0079 - December, the so-called "One Year War" has reached its final stage. After finishing the battle for Jaburo, the Zeon army "Wandering Group" was retreating. Somehow, they made it to space where their friends were... Meanwhile, a unit of the Federation Forces, the Red Three Giants, appeared!

title.en: We are the Main Characters of the Demon World!

altTitles.ja: 魔界の主役は我々だ！

altTitles.ja-ro: Makai no Shuuyaku wa Wareware da!

description.en:
Shaoron Teufel is an ambitious demon who has enrolled in the demon school known as Babyls, aiming to become popular and join the Student Council. However, a number of trials await him as soon as he arrives! Being recruited by a shady division, summoning a familiar, participating in a flying test… Will Shaoron be able to stand out even more than the special student, Iruma-kun?   
  
A collaboration between *Mairimashita! Iruma-kun* and a popular Japanese YouTube channel, *We are the Main Characters of ◯◯!*  

- [We are the Main Characters of ◯◯! channel](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCIZzHNbzlIskx3TxGznRyYg)

altTitles.ja: 快傑ライオン丸

description.en: During the Warring States period, the demon king Gosun, who has been hiding in the Himalayas for a hundred years and has mastered evil sorcery, is aiming to conquer Japan. Shishimaru fights as the invincible ninja Kaikitsu Lionmaru with the sword given to him by Koji Kashin, Japan's greatest ninja!

After the first Gate opened in 2018, Lim Dae-In survived for 20 years on Earth while being connected to other dimensions. 

The day after his long-awaited retirement celebration, he regresses by 20 years, back to when he had nothing…

altTitles.ja: 復讐の教科書

description.en: Kurose Ryotaro is a high school student who dreams of becoming a teacher. He admires his teacher, Mr. Shiratori, but is subjected to severe bullying every day. When the situation reaches an unexpected extreme, so is the outcome unexpected… and now, Kurose finds himself in the perfect position to teach his bullies an extracurricular they'll never forget.

altTitles.ja: ぼっち・ざ・ろっく！

description.en: Hitori Gotou is a high school girl who's starting to learn to play the guitar because she dreams of being in a band, but she's so shy that she hasn't made a single friend. However, her dream might come true after she meets Nijika Ijichi, a girl who plays drums and is looking for a new guitarist for her band.
description.es: Bocchi The Rock! cuenta la historia de Goto Hitori, una chica de secundaria que empieza a aprender a tocar la guitarra persiguiendo su sueño de formar parte de una banda. Pese a que es muy dedicada, su arrolladora timidez le impide poder conseguir siquiera una amiga. Pero cuando conozca a Ijichi Nijika, una baterista que está buscando una nueva guitarrista para su grupo, Goto dará el primer paso para cumplir su gran sueño página a página, tira a tira.
description.it: Hitori Goto è una liceale che inizia a imparare a suonare la chitarra in quanto il suo sogno è di entrare a far parte di una band, ma è talmente timida da non avere nemmeno un amico. Ma il suo sogno potrebbe avverarsi in seguito all'incontro con Nijika Ijichi, una ragazza che suona la batteria ed è alla ricerca proprio di un chitarrista per la band in cui suona.
description.ja:
「ぼっちちゃん」こと後藤ひとりは、ギターを愛する孤独な少女。
家で一人寂しく弾くだけの毎日でしたが、ひょんなことから伊地知虹夏が率いる「結束バンド」に加入することに。
人前での演奏に不慣れな後藤は、立派なバンドマンになれるのか――！？
全国のぼっちな少年少女に届ける、いま最高にアツい音楽漫画！！
陰キャならロックをやれ！！！
description.pt-br:
Hitori Gotou é uma colegial que está começando a aprender a tocar violão porque sonha em fazer parte de uma banda, mas é tão tímida que não fez um único amigo. No entanto, seu sonho pode se tornar realidade depois que ela conhece Nijika Ijichi, uma garota que toca bateria e está procurando um novo guitarrista para sua banda.

[ 1° TEMP.  DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 2, Cap 21. ]

title.en: Binbou Reijou no Kanchigai Seijo-den ~Okane no Tame ni Doryoku Shitetara, Oozoku Harem ga Dekite Imashita!?~

altTitles.ja: 貧乏令嬢の勘違い聖女伝　～お金のために努力してたら、王族ハーレムが出来ていました!?～

altTitles.en: Misunderstanding of the Poor Daughter Saint Lady: If You Worked Hard for Money, You Could Have a Royal Harem?!

description.en: Even though I'm a Baron's daughter, I have to become an adventurer? On my journey to make money in order to get our barony out of poverty, I died in a dungeon…wait a minute, was I reborn?! Everything is happening exactly as I remember it did. This time, I won't let our family become poor! I promise we will always have food on the table, and that I will grow up and marry into a rich family! Wait, father needs treatment for an illness?! The town is going through an epidemic?! What is going on? Why did I become an adventurer again?!
description.ja: 男爵令嬢なのに冒険者に!? そしたら、ダンジョンでまさかの死亡！ 目を覚ますと、そこには新しい人生が待っていた！ 彼女は聖女か、それとも勘違い――!? 後にひけないソフィアの華麗なる（？）聖女冒険譚！

altTitles.ja: 女騎士ゴブリン

description.en: A Female Knight unexpectedly swaps bodies with the Goblin getting ready to assault her. How will they both deal with this sudden gender and species change?

altTitles.ja: BASTARD!! 萩原一至 BASTARD!!未使用改訂版-
下絵 弐 (バスタード!! 暗黒の破壊神)

description.en:
Events taking place between volumes 18 and 19 of Bastard!!  
  
This material was originally going to be in the main manga, but that ended up not being the case.  
  
It was later released in various stages of completion over 3 doujinshi (Sketch, Unused, and Unused- Revised Edition)

In the era of astral pets, only the might of pets was essential! However, making the pets stronger has always been a slow and arduous process for pet warriors. That was until the appearance of a mysterious pet shop that changed everything!

The weakest skeleton could slay a great golden dragon with a single strike after training at this pet shop! Even the humble watchdog of the shop possessed ten legendary skills, and the female worker in the shop claimed to be a Goddess...

As for what the shopkeeper Su Ping thinks: I'm merely training these cute pets to become exceptional overlord beasts. What? Is it not normal?
- - -
In the era of beasts, pet strength determines everything! The battle pet master works hard and slowly to improve the strength of the pet. Until a mysterious pet store came out of nowhere!

In just a few days of cultivation, the lowly skeleton can kill the golden dragon with a single slash. Does the guard dog have ten secret skills of pet beats? The working girl even calls herself a god...

As for the owner, Su Ping: Isn't it a regular practice to breed cute pets into prehistoric king beasts?

Cheon Seju, had no choice but to join an organization to avenge his dead sister. After losing all hope in life, he meets a boy who reminds him of his sister and offers him a small act of kindness. 

If I had known that my light heart would become so heavy, I wouldn't have brought you with me.



"I told you, you'll always come first......." 

His gaze usually fierce gaze was different today. 
Cheon Seju's gaze was gentle, sweet and persistent.

"So take responsibility".

Cheon Seju was my first everything. He was the first person to ever reach out a hand to me, and gaze upon me. Sejin only accepted the man's hand because he offered it first and he only ever gazed upon him because he gazed upon him first. And that is how he fell in love with this sweet and affectionate man.

Sejin realized that he no longer wanted to be separated from Cheon Seju.
Where ever he goes, I'll go. 

"You are all I have left now......."

altTitles.ja: ヤンキーJKクズハナちゃん

altTitles.pt-br: Garota Delinquente Do Ensino Médio KuzuHana-chan

description.en:
At the beginning of the academic year, Saotome Hodaka enrolls into Moteshiro Prefectural High School, a former all-girls school that had recently integrated, but discovers it has a male to female ratio of 1:359! 

While most might think of this as a paradise, the majority of the students are delinquents and Saotome immediately finds himself being extorted by some of the more aggressive girls. However, he is inadvertently saved by Hanako Kuzuryu, a beautiful delinquent who just wants to be left alone.

Is this the start of a new friendship? And how will Saotome's life unfold in a school full of troublesome women?
description.pt-br:
Uma proporção de homem para mulher de 1:359?!

Saotome-kun é admitido em uma escola cheia de gyarus e conhece uma garota delinqüente chamada Hanako Kuzuryu.

altTitles.ja: meme娘

description.en: Memes, gaming consoles, and websites turned into anime girls! Please enjoy this compilation of meme comics, oneshots, and shorts from the team behind Merryweather Comics!
description.pl: Memy z internetu zostały zmienione w słodkie anime dziewczynki.
description.pt:
(Brazilian) / Português(Brasil): ||Memes da internet se tornaram garotas fofas de anime, criado por Merryweather e com arte por Princess Hinghoi.||  


---

**Links:**  
[Author's Twitter](https://twitter.com/Merryweatherey)  
[Author's Youtube (with Dubbed Comics)](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCvCtIO1it51jSkZGibS9R3w)
description.ru: Мемы из интернета, превращенные в милых анимешных девочек, создано Merryweather с иллюстрациями Princess Hinghoi.

description.en: A salaryman summons Astaroth, a Prince of Hell, to help him stop getting bullied at work.
In a strange city, there is a clinic that will treat the victims of horrific diseases. For a price.

altTitles.en: The Youngest Son of a Conglomerate
The Youngest Son of a Chaebol Family

altTitles.ja: 財閥家の末息子

altTitles.th: รีบอร์นริช

altTitles.fr: Le plus jeune petit fils du conglomérat

description.en: Having started from the bottom and worked his way to the top, Hyeonwoo finds himself betrayed by the royal family of Soonyang Group, the largest corporation in South Korea, after providing 13 years of dedicated service. Just when he thinks all his efforts have been made in vain and prepares to embrace his death, he suddenly wakes up in the body of Dojun Jin, the youngest grandson to the founder and CEO of Soonyang, having traveled back in time. Having been granted this second chance, Hyeonwoo begins to lay the foundation for his revenge against his evil relatives.

altTitles.ja: やしろの魔王

description.en: Maou Shaitan Geneha, a demon lord whose powers were sealed away, seeks out the descendant of the one who sealed her; company employee Shishibe Yashiro. Wanting Yashiro to undo the seal, Maou forms a contract with her, aiming to satisfy Yashiro in the hopes that she'll undo the seal.

"Please don’t touch the guy wearing glasses…"
Department head Kim, who quit his job as a special agent only for his daughter Minji and chose to be normal. Then one day, Minji disappeared silently, and Manager Kim began to find his daughter by turning the country that monitors him into the enemy.
description.ko:
제발 안경 쓴 아저씨는 건들지 말자.
오직 자신의 딸 '민지'를 위해 특수요원직을 관두고 평범함을 선택한 가장 김부장.
그러던 어느 날 민지가 소리소문 없이 사라지고, 김부장은 자신을 감시하는 국가를 적으로 돌리면서까지 딸을 찾아나서기 시작하는데...
[외모지상주의], [싸움독학] 그리고 [인생존망]을 잇는 박태준 유니버스의 공식 스핀오프 작품!
description.ru:
Пожалуйста, не трогайте мужчину в очках.
Менеджер Ким, глава семьи, который бросил работу специализированного агента и выбрал простую жизнь ради своей дочери Мин Джи.
Однажды в один прекрасный день Мин Джи исчезает, не говорив ни слова , и менеджер Ким начинает искать свою дочь, постепенно превращая страну, которая следит за ним, во врага...
description.pt-br: Pai solteiro, gerente de companhia e ex membro das forças especiais. O Sr. Kim vivia uma vida normal até sua filha, Minji, desaparecer. Depois de descobrir que ela poderia estar morta, o Sr. Kim parte em uma busca implacável por informações. Ele irá resgatar Minji a qualquer custo, mesmo que isso signifique destruir tudo e todos que cruzarem seu caminho.

description.en:
Is murdering to save lives justifiable?
Dr. Seowoo Han is targeted for revenge and ends up killing her attacker in self-defense. Her detective husband helps her dump the body and frame it as the work of a serial killer. The only problem? The real serial killer knows what they did, and is blackmailing them into committing more murders...
description.pt-br:
Assassinar para salvar vidas é justificável? 
Dra. Seowoo Han é alvo de vingança e acaba matando seu agressor em legítima defesa. Seu marido detetive a ajuda a se livrar do corpo e enquadrá-lo como obra de um serial killer. O problema? O verdadeiro serial killer sabe o que eles fizeram e os está chantageando para que cometam mais assassinatos...

title.en: Kurasu ≪Mushoku≫ no Eiyuu-tan ～Koushaku-ka o Tsuihou Sareta ga, Jitsu wa Nagutta Dake de Sukiru o Kakutoku Dekiru to Wakari, Tairiku Ichi no Eiyuu ni Noboritsumeru～

altTitles.ja: クラス≪無職≫の英雄譚～公爵家を追放されたが、実は殴っただけでスキルを獲得できるとわかり、大陸一の英雄に上り詰める～

altTitles.en: Class <<Unemployed>> Heroic Tale: Exiled from the Duke's House, but i found out that i can acquire skills just by punching and now i am climbing to the top of the continent ~
Chronicles of the Jobless Hero~Ousted From the Duke’s Manor, but With Skills Gained Through Punches, I Emerge as the Continent’s Ultimate Hero~

description.en:
In a world where Classes are bestowed by the gods upon everyone when they reach eighteen, the existence of Skills within these Classes tends to overshadow any hard work, setting one’s life path. Within this imbalanced system, Lythe, who trained in hopes of becoming a Holy Knight, was heartlessly classified as Jobless during the Class assignment, resulting in his expulsion from the town by his father, the Duke. As he scraped by as a luggage boy, there came a day when the merchant caravan he was with got attacked by bandits. Lythe, attempting to save the child, engaged in a battle with the skillful attackers, accepting his impending death. Yet, a mysterious voice echoed in his head when he punched a bandit in his last act of defiance…

- [Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n9583gj/)  (jp)
- [Alternative Raw Link: Niconico](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/58563)
description.ja: 18歳になると神から「クラス」が与えられる世界。クラスの持つ「スキル」の有無は、どんな努力をも上回り、どんなクラスかでその後の人生が決まってしまう。そんな不平等な世界で、聖騎士を目指し訓練してきたリートは、クラス分けで無情にも<無職>を言い渡され、父親である公爵の手により、街を追放されてしまう。そして荷物持ちで糊口をしのいでいたある日、商隊が盗賊に襲われる。子どもを救うため戦うが、戦闘スキル持ちに敵うはずもなくリートは死を覚悟する。しかし、最後の抵抗で盗賊を殴った瞬間、頭の中に不思議な声が鳴り響き…。

description.en:
South Korea is filled with various shitty laws.
The group of ‘juvenile kids’ that made my life into a living hell didn’t receive any punishment: these kids were the result of these shitty laws. I’ll now start my revenge.
description.kk:
Оңтүстік Корея әртүрлі заңдарға толы.
Менің өмірімді тозаққа айналдырған "жас балалар" тобы ешқандай жазаға тартылмады: бұл балалар осы заңдардың нәтижесі болды. Енді мен кек алуды бастаймын.
description.ko:
대한민국은 X같은 법들로 가득하다
나를 지옥으로 밀어넣고도 처벌받지 않았던 ‘촉법소년’들
그 X같은 법의 결과물들에게, 지금부터 복수를 시작한다
description.es-la: Corea del Sur está llena de leyes de mierda. El grupo de «menores» que convirtió mi vida en un infierno no recibió ningún castigo: esos menores fueron el resultado de esas leyes de mierda. Ahora comenzaré mi venganza. (Ocurre en el mismo universo de Lookism)

altTitles.zh-ro: Xing Meng Ou Xiang Ji Hua

description.en: The shining lights, the magnificent stage! Friendships created through singing, making a future through dancing, the girls embark on their journey towards their dreams! One who has lost status due to a scandal is hiding a plot behind her back. A pair of bosom friends, separated by fate. A girl who tries to exonerate her mother sets off on her journey for a talent competition. When the stage turns into an empty battlefield, she uses her voice to chase after her dreams.

altTitles.th: นักรักโลกมายา
หน้ากากแก้ว

altTitles.ja: ガラスの仮面

description.en:
Chigusa Tsukikage holds the rights to the play "The Crimson Goddess," a lost masterpiece that many would love to see brought back to the stage.  
  
Tsukikage, however, won't allow the cherished work to be diminished by an actress who isn't worthy of playing the title role. Fortunately, she has found two young actresses that just might be worthy: Maya Kitajima and Ayumi Himekawa. Though both actresses are exceptionally talented, only one can win the coveted role.

---
- **Won the Japan Cartoonists Association Award in 1995**

---

Published in Indonesian by Elex Media as **Topeng Kaca**

altTitles.ja: エレキシード

description.en:
Jiwoo is a kind-hearted young man who harnesses the lightning quick reflexes of a cat to secretly make the world a better place – one saved little child or foster pet at a time. Kayden is a secret agent on the run, who finds himself stuck in the body of a …um… decidedly fat old fluffy cat. Together, armed with Jiwoo’s super powers and Kayden’s uber-smarts, they’re out to fight those forces who would let evil rule this world. That is, if they can stand each other long enough to get the job done.

---
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/FANTASY/juexingbachanshiguan/list?title_no=1313)
- [Official Spanish <Es> Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/es/action/eleceed/list?title_no=2642)
- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/id/fantasy/eleceed/list?title_no=2034)
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0000883)
- [Official French Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/fr/fantasy/eleceed/list?title_no=2861)
- [Official Thai Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/th/fantasy/eleceed/list?title_no=3523)
description.es:
Jiwoo es un joven amable que utiliza sus reflejos increíblemente rápidos, como los de un gato, para hacer del mundo un mejor lugar salvando niños o mascotas. Kayden es un agente secreto prófugo que termina encerrado en el cuerpo de un... mmm... gato gordo, peludo y viejo. Juntos y con la ayuda de los superpoderes de Jiwoo y la inteligencia de Kayden lucharán contra las fuerzas que desean que el mal tome control del mundo. Aunque solo lo lograrán si consiguen soportarse lo suficiente para hacerlo.

---
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/FANTASY/juexingbachanshiguan/list?title_no=1313)
- [Official Spanish <Es> Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/es/action/eleceed/list?title_no=2642)

- [Official Thai Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/th/fantasy/eleceed/list?title_no=3523)
description.fr:
Jiwoo est un jeune lycéen au bon coeur qui utilise ses réflexes incroyablement rapides pour rendre le monde meilleur, que ce soit en sauvant un petit enfant ou bien un animal de compagnie. Kayden est un agent secret fugitif qui finit par être enfermé dans le corps d'un... euh... vieux, gros chat tout poilu. Ensemble, et équipés des superpouvoirs de Jiwoo et de l'intelligence de Kayden, ils lutteront contre les forces obscures qui veulent que le mal domine le monde... mais seulement s'ils arrivent à bien s'entendre !

---

Kolaborasi yang luar biasa dari author "Noblesse" dan author "Girls the Wild's"! Kisah aksi fantasi mengenai Kaiden yang jiwanya masuk ke seekor kucing gendut dan Jiwoo yang suka menyembunyikan kekuatannya!

敵の不意打ちで深い傷を負い、猫の体に身を隠した覚醒者のカイド。猫好きの主人公・勇羽に助けられるが… 『ノブレス』 X 『少女ザワイルズ』作家らによる爽快アクション！

고양이 몸에 깃든 각성자 카이든과 각성능력을 숨겨온 고등학생 지우
러블리 2인조의 액션 판타지

description.ru:
Кайден - загадочный человек, который словно комета спустился с неба. Весь израненный, почти потерявший последние силы, он решает скрыть свое присутствие - ведь по-другому от погони не уйти. По дороге Кайден встречает обычную дворовую кошку и, почти не думая, решает вселиться в ее тело. Со Чжи У - энергичный и общительный молодой человек из средней школы, который очень любит кошек. Один раз по пути домой он встречает до боли потрепанного кота и берет его к себе домой. Наш У не только добрый, но еще и обладает одной скрытой способностью. Какой же?

---

description.pt-br:
Ji-U é um jovem de bom coração que aproveita os reflexos rápidos de um gato para secretamente tornar o mundo um lugar melhor - uma criança salva ou um animal de estimação adotivo de cada vez. Kayden é um agente secreto em fuga, que se encontra preso no corpo de um... hum... decididamente gordo velho gato fofo. Juntos, armados com os superpoderes de Ji-U e a super inteligência de Kayden, eles estão prontos para lutar contra as forças que deixariam o mal governar este mundo. Isto é, se eles aguentarem um ao outro tempo suficiente para fazer o trabalho.

title.en: Koushaku Reijou ni Tensei shiteshimatta node, Mental Otome na Ore wa, Zenryoku de Onnanoko wo Tanoshimimasu

altTitles.ja: 公爵令嬢に転生してしまったので、メンタル乙女な俺は、全力で女の子を楽しみます

altTitles.en: Since I Have Been Reincarnated as the Daughter of a Duke, I, the "Girl Inside," Will Enjoy Being a Girl as Much as I Can!

description.en:
A humble man in his twenties suddenly dies and is reborn as the daughter of a duke in an 18th-century lookalike world where magic exists!
He is now living a second life as the adorable "Miranda Mirandiehl," who looks like a doll.
As he was always a "girl inside" with girlish interests, he accepted his reincarnation surprisingly easily.
And so, after being reborn as Miranda, he will enjoy his new life to the fullest!
What kind of encounters await him, and what lies ahead in his gender-swapped otherworldly reincarnation life?

Shin Yoomyeong is an unknown actor who kept on chasing his dream despite playing minor roles for 15 years because of his weak presence. One day, he meets the Acting Spirit, Yeonghwi, who he signs a contract with, and begins to shine in his career. In fact, he was always an acting genius,  but he was overshadowed by his weak presence. He creates a perfect character for every work he takes and slowly raises to stardom. However, Yeonghwi, who he saw as his benefactor, starts to seem suspicious…

title.en: Fake Saint of the Year: You Wanted the Perfect Saint? Too Bad!

altTitles.ja-ro: Nise Seijo Kuso of the Year: Risou no Seijo? Zannen, Nise Seijo deshita!

altTitles.ru: Фальшивая святая, отброс года. ~Идеальная святая? Нет, всего лишь подделка!~

altTitles.ja: 偽聖女クソオブザイヤー～理想の聖女？　残念、偽聖女でした！～

description.en:
[The Eternal Scattering Flowers: Fiore Caduto Eterna] is a game ill-suited of being known as a galge, as the main heroine would – regardless of the chosen route – meet her demise.

Fudou Niito, a resident of Japan, went to bed dissatisfied with the ending of the game. When he next awoke, he found himself in the body of the game’s hated fake saint, Elrise. Confused, but with an understanding that Elrise’s actions would spell disaster for many lives in the future, he took advantage of the situation and acted to change the course of history.

As a result, despite her rotten personality, Elrise was adored by those around her as a perfect saint. Furthermore, the game itself was intrinsically linked to his original world and changed accordingly to suit Elrise’s actions. Without any knowledge of what the hell was going on, the fake saint Elrise continued to alter her fate.

A saint on the outside, but a man on the inside.

The transmigrator was a piece of shit and the person he transmigrated into was also a piece of shit. A combination of shit and shit would cause an accident – to create the greatest fake saint shitshow of the year!
description.id:
[The Eternal Scattering Flowers: Fiore Caduto Eterna] adalah sebuah permainan yang tidak cocok untuk di panggil sebagai galge, karena apapun rute yang di pilih heroine utama akan selalu menemui ajalnya.

Fudou Niito, seorang penduduk di jepang, pergi tidur dengan ketidakpuasan pada akhir dari gamenya. Selanjutnya ketika dia terbangun, ia menemukan dirinya berada dalam tubuh seorang saint yang di benci dalam game, Elrise.

Dia kebingungan, namun dengan pemahaman bahwa tindakan Elrise akan menyebabkan bencana untuk banyak kehidupan di masa depan, dia memanfaatkan situasi itu dan bertindak untuk mengubah jalannya sejarah.

Sebagai hasilnya, terlepas dari kepribadian busuknya, Elrise di cintai oleh orang-orang di sekitarnya sebagai seorang saint yang sempurna. Terlebih lagi, game itu sendiri pada intinya terhubung dengan dunia asli tempatnya berada dan berubah berdasarkan tindakan Elrise. Tanpa mengetahui apa yang sedang terjadi, seorang saint palsu Elrise terus-menerus mengubah takdirnya.

Seorang saint di luar, namun pria di dalamnya.

Orang yang merasuki adalah seorang bajingan dan orang yang di rasukinya juga merupakan seorang bajingan. Kombinasi dari para bajingan akan menyebabkan mala petaka yang akan menciptakan pertunjukan saint palsu bajingan terbesar tahun ini!
description.ja:
異世界で無双！　偽聖女で何が悪い…!?
ギャルゲー『永遠の散花』は、どのルートを選んでもメインヒロインが死ぬギャルゲーである。 ゲーム内に登場する悪役へ転生した俺は、ヒロインのエテルナを救うため、ゲーム知識をフル活用しようとするのだが…？
description.ru:
Визуальный роман «Куон но Санка ~Fiore caduto eterna~» — несправедливая игра, где в каждой из веток истории главная героиня умирает. Я, переродившийся в поддельную святую-злодейку игры Эльризе, решил по полной использовать все свои знания об игре, чтобы спасти главную героиню, Этерну, однако…

Внешность святой девы, а внутри мужик. Дерьмовой душе — дерьмовый персонаж. Как же развернётся история, где по случайности два отброса слились воедино?

title.en: How the Little Brother Who Turned Into a Girl Became His Big Brother's Girlfriend

altTitles.ja: 兄貴の彼女になる、女の子になっちゃった弟。

altTitles.ja-ro: Aniki No Kanojo Ni Naru, Onnanoko Ni Nacchatta Otouto

altTitles.en: When I Returned Home for the First Time in a Long Time, My Brother Transformed Into a Girl

altTitles.ja: 久しぶりに実家に帰ったら弟がTSしてた。

altTitles.ja-ro: Hisashiburi Ni Jikka Ni Kaettara Otouto Ga TS Shiteta

description.en:
When I returned home for the first time in a long time, my little brother transformed into a girl!?

---

[Fantia 18+ Content](https://mangadex.org/title/7a23de9c-01b8-43bd-ac38-0bfe0bebcc3b)
description.id: Ketika aku pulang ke rumah setelah sekian lamanya adik tiri laki-laki ku berubah menjadi gadis!?

title.en: How to Survive as a Dragon with Time-Limit

altTitles.en: Survival Guide for a terminally-ill Dragon

description.en:
At the end of my terminally-ill life, I found myself reincarnated as a dragon in a webtoon. Once again, a life with a terminal illness, but this time, as a dragon?!

Lois, born with the heritage of the strongest creature in the world with wealth and thousands of years of lifespan as a dragon.

However, facing unpredictable crises at every turn, not knowing when I’ll die—what kind of Bullshit is this?!

It’s too unjust to just quietly die like this. Utilizing the future knowledge I have, I’ll survive like a villain and give this story a twist!

title.en: I Am the Descendant of the Divine Dragon!

description.en: In the highly competitive world of the Xuan Realm Continent, where warriors strive to refine their bodies, cultivate their martial abilities, harness the essence of the heavens and earth, and push beyond mortal limitations, our protagonist, Lu Hao, faces unjust persecution from his own clan since childhood. However, fate smiles upon him as he awakens the dormant bloodline of the Divine Dragon within him. With an unyielding resolve, Lu Hao embarks on an extraordinary journey, overcoming countless obstacles to ascend to the zenith of power. Along the way, he unravels the enigmatic secrets of his past life.

altTitles.ja: マオ

altTitles.th: หาญสู้พลิกชะตาอาถรรพณ์

description.en:
The story is set in a "land where two worlds intersect," and it centers on "a strange romance between a boy and girl who meet by fate."

(from ebookjapan):

Onmyoji and Yokai? A girl's bizarre Taisho romance! When she was in the first grade of elementary school, her whole family was involved in an accident, but she is the only one who survived. In her third year of junior high school, she passes by the accident site again and is somehow transported back to the Taisho Era!　

The next day, Nanoka's physical abilities are awakened when she is told by Mao, a boy she met there who is an Onmyoji, "You are a demon, aren't you?" The Taisho bizarre romance in which the two of them face their "destiny" that will come begins!


---
Official Release:
- English release by [Viz Media](https://www.viz.com/mao)
- Indonesian release by [Elex Media](https://www.gramedia.com/products/mao-01) (2021)

altTitles.ja: ニコイチ

description.en: This is a story about the love and hardships of a 29 year-old guy named Makoto Suda. Makoto is an ordinary office worker in every sense but one - in front of Takashi, his stepchild, he disguises himself as a woman and plays the role of a beautiful mother. While leading this “fatherless family” life, he falls in love with a woman. One morning he sees her on a crowded train, but… she’s being molested!?

altTitles.en: TSUYOSHI: The one who no one can win against

altTitles.ja: TSUYOSHI 誰にも勝てない、アイツには

altTitles.ja-ro: TSUYOSHI: Daremo Katenai, Aitsu ni wa

altTitles.th: Tsuyoshi ไอ้หนุ่มหมัดพิฆาตลูกป๋องแป๋ง

description.en: A super-powerful guy keeps defeating everyone around him, even though he doesn't like fighting.

title.en: I Can Use the Card Drawing System to Summon Beautiful Girls

altTitles.zh: 我能用抽卡系统召唤美少女

altTitles.zh-ro: Wo Neng Yong Chou Ka Xitong Zhaohuan Mei Shaonv

description.en: “It’s a disaster! I’ve been taken over by a mysterious card-drawing system and found myself surrounded by adorable girls in a mobile game! What’s even more terrifying is that among them is the antagonist sister sent by the Demon King from another world to hunt me down. What should I do? Seeking urgent advice online!”

altTitles.en: I Rely on Rewarding Apprentices to Upgrade

altTitles.zh-ro: Wo Kao Da Shang Tudi Shengji

description.en: The master is driving the crane west, what should I do if the enemy comes to the door? ! Awaken the apprenticeship rebate system, the more you give to your apprentice, the more you get back to your master! Hahaha, good disciples, hurry up, as a teacher, you never hide your secrets!

title.en: May I Kill You, Your Highness?

altTitles.en: Can I Kill You, Your Majesty?

altTitles.ru: Могу ли я убить Вас, Ваше Величество?

altTitles.vi: Bệ hạ, tôi sẽ giết ngài!

altTitles.zh-ro: May I Kill You, Your Majesty?

description.ar:
ماتت بسبب الأمير وهذه هي عودتها الرابعة.
 لا أستطيع أن أموت مرة أخرى.
 الامير...
 سأغويه.
 "اخبرني مره اخرى. ما تحدثنا عنه في ذلك الوقت ".
 نظر كاستيان الملطخ بالدماء إلى إيرنديل وقال ،
 "أنا معجب بك أنا جاد. قلت ذلك ، أليس كذلك؟ " أدرك إيرنديل أخيرًا.
 
 "إذا أنقذت حياتك ، أخبريني أنك ستكونين معي لبقية حياتك."
 لقد تم تحريف هذا الشيء.

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%A3%BD%EC%97%AC%EB%8F%84-%EB%90%A0%EA%B9%8C%EC%9A%94-%ED%8F%90%ED%95%98/3325), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/61260193)
description.en:
I died because of the prince, and it’s my fourth return. I can’t die again. The prince… Let’s seduce him!

“Tell me again. What we talked about back then.”

The blood stained Castian looked at Earendel and said, “I like you. I’m serious. You said that, didn’t you?”

Earendel finally realized…

“So if I save your life, tell me you’ll be with me for the rest of your life.”

…that something has been twisted.

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%A3%BD%EC%97%AC%EB%8F%84-%EB%90%A0%EA%B9%8C%EC%9A%94-%ED%8F%90%ED%95%98/3325), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/61260193)
description.fr:
C'était un jour de printemps chaud et ensoleillé, mais différent de d'habitude. (Il y a un jour comme ça, Erendel.) Ma mère me l'a dit une fois. Mais elle est morte il y a plus de dix ans. [C'est un jour curieux où je fais des choses que je ne fais pas d'habitude. Il faut être très prudent un tel jour. [Pourquoi?] Ce jour-là, les yeux violets de ma mère brillaient faiblement au soleil. Elle a jeté un regard froid à la question de sa fille. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ [ Si tu fais une erreur, tu peux être ensorcelée. ] Elle a dit quelque chose que je n'ai pas pu comprendre. [ Être fasciné est pour un moment, mais être ensorcelé est pour toute une vie. ] ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Erendel était assis sur le sol et regardait l'homme avec des yeux vides. Son visage couvert de sang ne lui était pas familier. Non, peut-être qu'elle ne sait vraiment pas. Peut-être que je suis en train de rêver. Mais comme pour m'informer que c'était un espoir sans espoir. Une voix grave a appelé mon nom. "...Erendel." "Redis-moi. Ce dont nous avons parlé à l'époque." Sur les yeux violets clairs d'Erendel se reflétait le Kin ...trempé de sang du Prince Castian. "Je vous aime bien." [ J'aime beaucoup le Prince Castia. C'est aussi beaucoup. ] "Je le pense" [ Je suis sérieux ] "...vous avez dit ça, n'est-ce pas?" "Ou tu m'as menti? Le sourire de Castian était vide. "Je suis en train de me faire avoir." Puis il reprit "Alors dis-moi que je dois te sauver la vie. Puis dis-moi que tu seras à mes côtés." "Vous êtes venu me voir parce que vous vouliez vivre de toute façon, n'est-ce pas?" Il argumente. ...Je veux dire, je ne savais vraiment pas. Que mon ami, que je prenais pour un fou, était le Prince Castian qui m'avait tué tant de fois. savent aussi ce qui va se passer à cause des mots choisis.

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%A3%BD%EC%97%AC%EB%8F%84-%EB%90%A0%EA%B9%8C%EC%9A%94-%ED%8F%90%ED%95%98/3325), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/61260193)

altTitles.en: The best medical god in the city

description.en: "Five years ago, the Ye family was destroyed, and the trash Ye Chen disappeared mysteriously." Five years later, that Ye Family trash is back! He came back with a cultivating body that penetrated the heavens and the earth and cried, "Ghosts and gods!" This time, Ye Chen wants to make the sky fall in awe! Let the Earth tremble! To be in control of everything, to the top of the sky！”

altTitles.ja: タルタロス劇場ワイルド

description.en: Collection of 4-komas centered around Persona 3, 4, 5 and their various spinoff games.
